description: {c As you enter this dark room, your nose is hit with a firm scent of dust.  Towers
made from crates and boxes scatter the room.  The floor is littered with tatered
rags, broken weapons, and other assorted items.  There is a grate leading down. {x
56126.name: {*Secret Room

description: {cThe sewer continues in the direction you travel.  The air seems
to get colder and thicker, and it starts to cling to your body.  The
ceiling seems nonexistent in the darkness.  Water drips from
above you and lands in the stream under you.{x
56144.name: {wS{*ewer {wP{*assage{x

description: {cThe sewer continues along, raw sewage covers the entire sewer floor.
sewer water streams through, heading towards no where in particular.
small holes in the walls are now home to spiders, bugs, and rats, all
denizens of the sewers.  {x
56179.name: {wT{*he {wS{*ewer {wP{*assage{x

description: {cYou notice that the stream of sewer water floods at the drain at the base
of the wall.  Filth floats around the surface of the pool.  You see a small
snake slither across the pool after a small rat, apparently trying to catch
its next meal.  As you pass the sewer drain, you hear a loud growl.{x
56165.name: {wT{*he {wS{*ewer {wP{*assage{x

description: {cThe sewer stops here and what appears to be a crypt starts
begins.  The sounds of dripping water are less, and the musty
smell of dust starts to enter your nose.  Dust and mold cover
broken bones littered on the floor.  Burial niches are dug in the
walls, all of them half filled with skeletons.{x
56171.name: {wT{*he {wS{*ewer {wC{*rypt{x

description: {cThis portion of the passage is different than the rest of the sewers,
it is much cleaner and dry than the other portions.  The bricks on the
walls are neatly constructed, all are in straight columns and rows.  The
walls stand up straight, and form perfect right angles with the ceiling
and floor.  The sounds of the streets and dripping water are vacant
here.  The stream of sewer water is almost non existent too.{x
56134.name: {wS{*ewer {wP{*assage{x

description: {cThe passage continues along, becoming more narrow and shorter.  Water
still streams under your feet, but not as much as before.  The stench of
sewage and waste continues to overwhelm your nose as you continue
trekking through the sewer passage. The noise of the streets becomes
slightly less. A grate rests above you.{x
56129.name: {wT{*he {wS{*ecret {wS{*ewer {wP{*assageway{x

description: {cYou notice that the stream of sewer water floods at the drain at the base
of the wall.  Filth floats around the surface of the pool.  You see a small
snake slither across the pool after a small rat, apparently trying to catch
its next meal.  As you pass the sewer drain, you hear a loud growl.{x
56180.name: {wT{*he {wS{*ewer {wP{*assage{x

description: {cThe passage continues along, becoming more narrow and shorter.  Water
still streams under your feet, but not as much as before.  The stench of
sewage and waste continues to overwhelm your nose as you continue
trekking through the sewer passage. The noise of the streets becomes
slightly less. {x
56140.name: {wS{*ewer {wP{*assage{x

description: {cA small bend in the pipes shows much the same as was in the last
passage.  Refuge of all types.  Bits of bone, a trinket here, a lost bobble
there.  But at the heart, the stench remains, over whelming and noxious.{x
56184.name: {wT{*he {wS{*ewer {wP{*assage{x

description: {cThe sewer stops here and what appears to be a crypt starts
begins.  The sounds of dripping water are less, and the musty
smell of dust starts to enter your nose.  Dust and mold cover
broken bones littered on the floor.  Burial niches are dug in the
walls, all of them half filled with skeletons.{x
56156.name: {wT{*he {wS{*ewer {wC{*rypt{x

description: {c The sounds of laughter, shouting and music can be heard from way
above, perhaps it is a tavern..  Water runs down the walls, and collects
into a big puddle in the middle of the passage.  You see a rat scurry and
swim across the puddle, making a big splash and more noise than the
whole sewer.  A grate sits above your head.{x
56186.name: {wT{*he {wS{*ewer {wP{*assage{x

description: {cAs you travel along the dark corridor, the sound of dripping enters
your ears.  It seems to be coming from the north, and is oddly the
only sound you hear.  You see a large pool of brown liquid in the middle
of the passage.{x
56123.name: {wS{*ewer {wP{*assage

description: {cThis small room is very neatly constructed.  The bricks on the
walls and floor are in perfect unison, evenly spaced and they
are perfectly cut into rectangles.  The smell of the sewers
emanates from a square grate sits under you.  A trapdoor above
you hides in the shadows.{x
56162.name: {wT{*he {wS{*ecret {wS{*ewer {wE{*ntrance{x

description: {cAs you travel through the passage, you see to the side a pile of what
remains to be some street urchin's possessions, and his old decaying
corpse.  Flies, maggots, rats, and other sewer dwelling creatures have
taken haven in the pile.  The smell of the sewer covers up any hint of
corpse rot.{x
56138.name: {wS{*ewer {wP{*assage{x

description: {cThe crypt continues.  Burial niches cover the walls.  Bones
litter the floor, and mold grows over them.  This sewer crypt
is almost vacant of all of the sewer noises.  The air is dry
and musty.{x
56172.name: {wT{*he {wS{*ewer {wC{*rypt{x

description: {cBurial niches cover the walls of the crypt, and sarcophaguses litter
the passage.  The musty smell fills your nose.  Bones litter the floor
between each sarcophagus, and mold grows everywhere.  You notice
that some of the sarcophaguses are open, revealing empty coffins.{x
56153.name: {wT{*he {wS{*ewer {wC{*rypt{x

description: {cAt the beginning of the passage, the stones that make up the sewer
are rounded and crudely put together.  But as you pass, the stone
becomes square and neatly worked.  All of the lines match up and
all of the stone blocks are identical and nearly perfect.  A signature
can be barely read at the base of the wall, Oskar Strakeln, the head
stone mason.  A middle sized grate sits above your head.{x
56137.name: {wS{*ewer {wP{*assage{x

description: {cThe passage continues along, becoming more narrow and shorter.  Water
still streams under your feet, but not as much as before.  The stench of
sewage and waste continues to overwhelm your nose as you continue
trekking through the sewer passage. The noise of the streets becomes
slightly less. {x
56175.name: {wT{*he {wN{*ortheast {wS{*ewer {wP{*assage{x

description: {cThe sewer continues along, raw sewege covers the entire sewer floor.
Sewer water streams through, heading towards no where in particular.
Small holes in the walls are now home to spiders, bugs, and rats, all
denizens of the sewers.  {x
56143.name: {wS{*ewer {wP{*assage{x

description: {cThe sewer continues in the direction you travel.  The air seems
to get colder and thicker, and it starts to cling to your body.  The
ceiling seems nonexistent in the darkness.  Water drips from
above you and lands in the stream under you.{x
56163.name: {wT{*he {wS{*ewer {wP{*assage{x

description: {cThe sewer continues on, the air feels thick and wet.  It clings to
your body as you try to pass through the sewer.  The walls are
covered with grime and all sorts of waste from above.  The sounds
of dripping and running water come from all around you, and your
nose is constantly filled with the retched smell of sewage.{x
56106.name: {wT{Dhe {wS{Dewer {wS{Douth {wP{Dassage{x

description: {cThe sewer continues on, the air feels thick and wet.  It clings to
your body as you try to pass through the sewer.  The walls are
covered with grime and all sorts of waste from above.  The sounds
of dripping and running water come from all around you, and your
nose is constantly filled with the retched smell of sewage.  A
grate lies closed above you.{x
56176.name: {wT{*he {wN{*ortheast {wS{*ewer {wP{*assage{x

description: {cThis portion of the passage is different than the rest of the sewers,
it is much cleaner and dry than the other portions.  The bricks on the
walls are neatly constructed, all are in straight columns and rows.  The
walls stand up straight, and form perfect right angles with the ceiling
and floor.  The sounds of the streets and dripping water are vacant
here.  The stream of sewer water is almost non existent too.{x
56136.name: {wS{*ewer {wP{*assage{x

description: {cThe sewer continues along, raw sewege covers the entire sewer
floor.  Sewer water streams through it, heading north.  Small holes in
the walls are now home to spiders, bugs, and rats, all denizens of the
sewers.  {x
56102.name: {wT{Dhe {wS{Doutheast {wS{Dewer {wP{Dassage{x

description: {cThe sewer continues along, raw sewege covers the entire sewer floor.
Sewer water streams through, heading towards no where in particular.
Small holes in the walls are now home to spiders, bugs, and rats, all
denizens of the sewers.  {x
56108.name: {wT{Dhe {wS{Dewer {wS{Douth {wP{Dassage{x

description: {cAs you travel along the corridor, the smell of filth and waste become
stronger.  The stream of water starts to get a little deeper, and it is
moving a little bit faster.  The ceiling droops down an extra couple
of feet, where water drips.  The sounds of the streets are almost vacant
here.{x
56124.name: {wS{*ewer {wP{*assage

description: {cHere the sewer truly begins, with the dank tunnel extending to the
south.  Cast continual streams in through an opening in the top of the
tunnel, far too high to be jumped, and far too high to fall safely.
Voices from the streets waft down upon reeking air currents.  On the
floor is an inch of raw sewage, making the footing unsure and
slippery.  The smell is overbearing, assaulting the nose with almost
maniacal force.  {x
56101.name: {wT{Dhe {wS{Doutheast {wS{Dewer {wP{Dassage{x

description: {cThe crypt continues.  Burial niches cover the walls.  Bones
litter the floor, and mold grows over them.  This sewer crypt
is almost vacant of all of the sewer noises.  The air is dry
and musty.{x
56149.name: {wT{*he {wS{*ewer {wC{*rypt{x

description: {cThe sewer continues along to the north and south.  The air seems
to get colder and thicker, and it stars to cling to your body.  The
ceiling seems nonexistent in the darkness.  Water drips from
above you and lands in the stream under you.{x
56103.name: {wT{Dhe {wS{Doutheast {wS{Dewer {wP{Dassage{x

description: {cAt the beginning of the passage, the stones that make up the sewer
are rounded and crudely put together.  But as you pass, the stone
becomes square and neatly worked.  All of the lines match up and
all of the stone blocks are identical and nearly perfect.  A signature
can be barely read at the base of the wall, Oskar Strakeln, the head
stone mason.{x
56133.name: {wS{*ewer {wP{*assage{x

description: {cThe passage continues along, becoming more narrow and shorter.  Water
still streams under your feet, but not as much as before.  The stench of
sewage and waste continues to overwhelm your nose as you continue
trekking through the sewer passage. The noise of the streets becomes
slightly less. {x
56147.name: {wT{*he {wS{*ewer {wP{*assage{x

description: {cAs you enter this room, the smell of the sewer become increasingly less
foul, but more stagnant.  All the sewage and filth from these sewer that
made its way in here has been decayed to dirt.  Dirt and mud cakethe floor
of this forgot room.  Foot prints can be barely made out, but you cannot
tell how old they are.  All sounds of the sewer seem to disappear, no
dripping, rats running, or flowing water.  They all are vacant.  The secret
passage continues east.{x
56117.name: {wS{Decret {wP{Dassage{x

description: {cThe sewer stops here and what appears to be a crypt starts
begins.  The sounds of dripping water are less, and the musty
smell of dust starts to enter your nose.  Dust and mold cover
broken bones littered on the floor.  Burial niches are dug in the
walls, all of them half filled with skeletons.{x
56148.name: {wT{*he {wS{*ewer {wC{*rypt{x

description: {c The sounds of laughter, shouting and music can be heard from way
above, perhaps it is a tavern..  Water runs down the walls, and collects
into a big puddle in the middle of the passage.  You see a rat scurry and
swim across the puddle, making a big splash and more noise than the
whole sewer.{x
56195.name: {wT{*he {wS{*ewer {wP{*assage{x

description: {cThis small room is covered with dust and mold.  The air is
stagnant and dry, making it difficult to breath.  Bits and pieces
of wood are littered all over the floor.  The smell of the sewers
emanates from under a grate under the floor, and a trapdoor
hides above you in the shadows.{x
56187.name: {wT{*he {wS{*ecret {wS{*ewer {wE{*ntrance{x

description: {cThe sewer continues in the direction you travel.  The air seems
to get colder and thicker, and it starts to cling to your body.  The
ceiling seems nonexistent in the darkness.  Water drips from
above you and lands in the stream under you.{x
56191.name: {wT{*he {wS{*ewer {wP{*assage{x

description: {cLight from the tavern creeps through the floor and into this small
hidden passageway.  The floor is littered with forks, knives and
other utensils.  Crumbs and pieces of food also make home down on
the floor.  The smell of alcohol is inheritantly strong from down
here.  One board to the side is not bolted in, and looks loose enough
to move.{x
56131.name: {wU{*nder {wT{*he {wG{*atehouse {wT{*avern{x

description: {cThe corridor remains relatively the same.  The walls are still
neatly constructed, and the floors and walls remain relatively
dry and clean.  On the eastern wall is an inscribed message:
"Here lies Oskar Strakeln, head stone mason of the Baldur's
Gate Sewer Project."{x
56174.name: {wT{*he {wS{*ewer {wP{*assage{x

description: {cThe sewer continues on, the air feels thick and wet.  It clings to
your body as you try to pass through the sewer.  The walls are
covered with grime and all sorts of waste from above.  The sounds
of dripping and running water come from all around you, and your
nose is constantly filled with the retched smell of sewage.{x
56127.name: {wT{*he {wS{*outheast {wS{*ewer {wP{*assage{x

description: {cYou notice that the stream of sewer water floods at the drain at the base
of the wall.  Filth floats around the surface of the pool.  You see a small
snake slither across the pool after a small rat, apparently trying to catch
its next meal.  As you pass the sewer drain, you hear a loud growl.{x
56146.name: {wT{*he {wS{*ewer {wP{*assage{x

description: {cYou notice that the stream of sewer water floods at the drain at the base
of the wall.  Filth floats around the surface of the pool.  You see a small
snake slither across the pool after a small rat, apparently trying to catch
its next meal.  As you pass the sewer drain, you hear a loud growl.{x
56142.name: {wS{*ewer {wP{*assage{x

description: {cAs you enter this portion of the sewer, the first thing you notice
is that the corridor becomes larger.  The walls spread apart about
an extra 10 feet.  Four different passageways connect here, each
wall is perfectly straight, each row and column of bricks are
symmetrical.{x
56135.name: {wS{*ewer {wP{*assage{x

description: {cThe smell of mold and sewage overwhelms your nose as you enter the
passage.  The air is wet and warm.  The sounds of music and laughter
can be heard from above.  Mold grows on all of the walls and waste
covers the floor.  A small grate sits under you.{x
56130.name: {wA {wS{*ecret {wP{*assage{x

description: {cThe sewer crypt and the sewer converge together in this passage.
The crypt stones become square and neatly worked.  All of the lines
match up and all of the stone blocks are identical and nearly perfect.
A signature can be barely read at the base of the wall, Oskar Strakeln,
the head stone mason.{x
56159.name: {wT{*he {wS{*ewer {wP{*assage{x

description: {cSewer filth covers the walls and floor.  The stream of water flows
through and continues going east and west.  A smaller stream breaks
off and flows north right into the wall.  As you pass by the small
stream, a rat scurries across the floor and hides in a crack in the
northern wall.  You look at the crack and notice it runs up about 5
feet, then over a couple feet, and back down to the ground, making a
rectangluar outline the size of a man.  {x
56110.name: {wT{Dhe {wS{Dewer {wS{Douth {wP{Dassage{x

description: {cThe crypt continues.  Burial niches cover the walls.  Bones
litter the floor, and mold grows over them.  This sewer crypt
is almost vacant of all of the sewer noises.  The air is dry
and musty.{x
56152.name: {wT{*he {wS{*ewer {wC{*rypt{x

description: {cAt the beginning of the passage, the stones that make up the sewer
are rounded and crudely put together.  But as you pass, the stone
becomes square and neatly worked.  All of the lines match up and
all of the stone blocks are identical and nearly perfect.  A signature
can be barely read at the base of the wall, Oskar Strakeln, the head
stone mason.{x
{cThis portion of the crypt becomes much wider as three
passageways converge at this one spot.  The burial niches
become less on the walls.  Bones and mold cover the floor
and the musty smell remains in the air.  A large wood door
that is falling apart rests above you.{x
56154.name: {wT{*he {wS{*ewer {wC{*rypt{x

description: {cWith each breath, those who survive on oxygen suffer.  The littered bones
and bloated parts of bodies, mixed with the refuse,  only help to suffocate
those foolish enough to walk these passages.  Rats hop along the top of
feces while looking for pray.{x
56197.name: {wT{*he {wS{*ewer {wP{*assage{x

description: {cYou notice that the stream of sewer water floods at the drain at the base
of the wall.  Filth floats around the surface of the pool.  You see a small
snake slither across the pool after a small rat, apparently trying to catch
its next meal.  As you pass the sewer drain, you hear a loud growl.{x
56196.name: {wT{*he {wS{*ewer {wP{*assage{x

description: {cThe passage continues along, becoming more narrow and shorter.  Water
still streams under your feet, but not as much as before.  The stench of
sewage and waste continues to overwhelm your nose as you continue
trekking through the sewer passage. The noise of the streets becomes
slightly less.  A small wooden door sits above you.{x
56169.name: {wT{*he {wS{*ewer {wP{*assage{x

description: {cThe sewer continues on, the air feels thick and wet.  It clings to
your body as you try to pass through the sewer.  The walls are
covered with grime and all sorts of waste from above.  The sounds
of dripping and running water come from all around you, and your
nose is constantly filled with the retched smell of sewage.{x
56185.name: {wT{*he {wS{*ewer {wP{*assage{x

description: {cThe sewer continues in the direction you travel.  The air seems
to get colder and thicker, and it starts to cling to your body.  The
ceiling seems nonexistent in the darkness.  Water drips from
above you and lands in the stream under you.{x
56107.name: {wT{Dhe {wS{Dewer {wS{Douth {wP{Dassage{x

description: {cThe sewer continues in the direction you travel.  The air seems
to get colder and thicker, and it stars to cling to your body.  The
ceiling seems nonexistent in the darkness, the only way you know it
is there is from the drips of water from above.  Well, you think its water.{x
56112.name: {wT{Dhe {wS{Dewer {wS{Douth {wP{Dassage{x

description: {cThis small room is covered with dust and mold.  The air is
stagnant and dry, making it difficult to breath.  Bits and pieces
of wood are littered all over the floor.  A musty smell emanates
from under a large wooden door on the floor, and a trapdoor hides
above you in the shadows.{x
56158.name: {wT{*he {wS{*ecret {wS{*ewer {wE{*ntrance{x

description: {cBelow the Elfsong is a ladder leading down into the sewers.  The
walls are made of stone blocks, and are slimy and smelly.  Down below
in the darkness, there is the faint sound of running water in the
sewers, and the scurrying of various creatures.  There is a grate
above you hidden in the darkness of the cellar entrance.  {x
56100.name: {wT{Dhe {wS{Dewer {wE{Dntrance{x

description: {cThis portion of the passage is different than the rest of the sewers,
it is much cleaner and dry than the other portions.  The bricks on the
walls are neatly constructed, all are in straight columns and rows.  The
walls stand up straight, and form perfect right angles with the ceiling
and floor.  The sounds of the streets and dripping water are vacant
here.  The stream of sewer water is almost non existent too.{x
56160.name: {wT{*he {wS{*ewer {wP{*assage{x

description: {cThe passage continues along, becoming more narrow and shorter.  Water
still streams under your feet, but not as much as before.  The stench of
sewage and waste continues to overwhelm your nose as you continue
trekking through the sewer passage. The noise of the streets becomes
slightly less. {x
56193.name: {wT{*he {wS{*ewer {wP{*assage{x

description: {cAs you start to pass through, you notice that the passage starts to
become wider, and eventually connects to 3 other passages.  The sound
of dripping enters your ears, it appears to be comming from the north.
Moans are heard comming from the south, and to the east you think you
hear a growling.  Your only exits are north, south, east, and west.{x
56168.name: {wT{*he {wS{*ewer {wP{*assage{x

description: {c The passage continues along, becoming more narrow and shorter.  Water
still streams under your feet, but not as much as before.  The stench of
the sewers contnues to overwhelm your nose as you continue trecking
through the sewer passage. The noise of the streets becomes slightly less. {x
56121.name: {wT{*he {wN{*ortheast {wS{*ewer {wP{*assage{x

description: {cThe streets above you are quiet, there are almost no sounds of footsteps
or any other city sounds.  Mold grows on the walls and water drips from
the ceiling and runs down the walls.  Dirt and other filth rests on the
floor.  A ray of light shines through a hole in the ceiling, and a circular
outline can be made out.{x
56194.name: {wT{*he {wS{*ecret {wS{*ewer {wE{*ntrance{x

description: {cThe sewer continues in the direction you travel.  The air seems
to get colder and thicker, and it starts to cling to your body.  The
ceiling seems nonexistent in the darkness.  Water drips from
above you and lands in the stream under you.{x
56141.name: {wT{*he {wS{*ewer {wP{*assage{x

description: {cA dead end...  In the corner, where no light shines, glow a pair of red
eyes.  Sounds of nails clicking along stone.  Echoing in the background
is the sound of a rat scurrying.  Piles of bone and tattered clothe lie all
over the floor.{x
56183.name: {wT{*he {wS{*ewer {wP{*assage{x

description: {cHere a figure lies against the wall, chained by their wrists.  This
skeletal figure's legs are splayed apart and a dark stain is between
them all the way to the knees.  Sores and leasions adorn it's legs
like demonic badges of honor.  It's head lolls from side to side, as
if in a drunken stupor, and a moment later some skin somewhere splits,
releasing noxious gasses, as if the body was dead.  An ichor flows
from the open wounds, with puss and dead plasma mixed in.  The smell
is horrid, and things become worse as the figure moans quietly.  It
stirs a bit, and that is when it becomes apparent that it is either a
person or a zombie.  The race is indeterminate, save for it being
humanoid.  The flesh of the hands have nearly rotted off leaving
exposed muscle and bone.  The ears have been eaten off by something.
The toes are gone as well.  The clothes it is wearing have worn to
nothing but grey, the bland color of despair.   {x
56119.name: {wT{Dhe C{Dell{x

description: {c The sounds of laughter, shouting and music can be heard from way
above, perhaps it is a tavern..  Water runs down the walls, and collects
into a big puddle in the middle of the passage.  You see a rat scurry and
swim across the puddle, making a big splash and more noise than the
whole sewer.{x
56111.name: {wT{Dhe {wS{Dewer {wS{Douth {wP{Dassage{x

description: {cThis small room is covered with dust and mold.  The air is
stagnant and dry, making it difficult to breath.  Bits and pieces
of wood are littered all over the floor.  The smell of the sewers
emanates from under a grate under the floor, and a trapdoor
hides above you in the shadows.{x
56178.name: {wT{*he {wS{*ecret {wS{*ewer {wE{*ntrance{x

description: {cThe sewer continues along, raw sewege covers the entire sewer floor.
Sewer water streams through, heading towards no where in particular.
Small holes in the walls are now home to spiders, bugs, and rats, all
denizens of the sewers.  {x
56132.name: {wS{*ewer {wP{*assage{x

description: {cThe passage continues along, becoming more narrow and shorter.  Water
still streams under your feet, but not as much as before.  The stench of
sewage and waste continues to overwhelm your nose as you continue
trekking through the sewer passage. The noise of the streets becomes
slightly less. {x
56189.name: {wT{*he {wS{*ewer {wP{*assage{x

description: {cThe crypt continues.  Burial niches cover the walls.  Bones
litter the floor, and mold grows over them.  This sewer crypt
is almost vacant of all of the sewer noises.  The air is dry
and musty.{x
56155.name: {wT{*he {wS{*ewer {wC{*rypt{x

description: {cThe sewer continues on, the air feels thick and wet.  It clings to
your body as you try to pass through the sewer.  The walls are
covered with grime and all sorts of waste from above.  The sounds
of dripping and running water come from all around you, and your
nose is constantly filled with the retched smell of sewage.{x
56166.name: {wT{*he {wS{*ewer {wP{*assage{x

description: {cYou hear the streets of the city above you.  The city seems so alive
from the sewer, all the people walking, talking, and just living out their
lives.  From up here you can smell the stench of the sewer waste and
filth from under the grate barring you to the sewers beneath you. {x
56105.name: {wT{Dhe {wS{Dewer {wE{Dntrance{x

description: {c Vague sounds of people can be heard from above.  The
sounds of a market emanates from above.  This portion
of the sewers is wider than the rest, yet it still has the
rank smell.  Water drips from above into a stream under
you.  The sewer walls are covered in mold.  There is a
grate sitting above you.  The only visible exits are north,
south, and east.{x
56181.name: {wT{*he {wS{*ewer {wP{*assage{x

description: {cAs you travel through the passage, you see to the side a pile of what
remains to be some street urchin's possessions, and his old decaying
corpse.  Flies, maggots, rats, and other sewer dwelling creatures have
taken haven in the pile.  The smell of the sewer covers up any hint of
corpse rot.{x
56113.name: {wT{Dhe {wS{Dewer {wS{Douth {wP{Dassage{x

description: {cA small bend in the pipes shows much the same as was in the last
passage.  Refuge of all types.  Bits of bone, a trinket here, a lost bobble
there.  But at the heart, the stench remains, over whelming and noxious. A
grate sits above you, waiting to be moved.{x
56125.name: {wT{*he {wN{*ortheast {wS{*ewer {wP{*assage{x

description: {cAs you travel along the corridor, the smell of filth and waste become
stronger.  The stream of water starts to get a little deeper, and it is
moving a little bit faster.  The ceiling droops down an extra couple
of feet, where water drips.  The sounds of the streets are almost vacant
here.{x
56164.name: {wT{*he {wS{*ewer {wP{*assage{x

description: {cA dead end...  In the corner, where no light shines, glow a pair of red
eyes.  Sounds of nails clicking along stone.  Echoing in the background
is the sound of a rat scurrying.  Piles of bone and tattered clothe lie all
over the floor.{x
56190.name: {wT{*he {wN{*ortheast {wS{*ewer {wP{*assage{x

description: {cYou come across a bend in the sewer.  There is no real change in
this part of the sewer.  Sewer water still drips from above, and it
still streams under you.  Waste carried in the stream piles against
the wall, and mold grows on the walls.  The only exits and north
and east. {x
56128.name: {wT{*he {wS{*outheast {wS{*ewer {wP{*assage{x

description: {cThis portion of the crypt becomes much wider as three
passageways converge at this one spot.  Burial niches
still cover the walls, and the floor is still littered with bones
and mold.  A musty smell fills the air, making it very
difficult to breath.  A large wood door sits above you.{x
56151.name: {wT{*he {wS{*ewer {wC{*rypt{x

description: {cYou hear the streets of the city above you.  The city seems so alive
from the sewer, all the people walking, talking, and just living out their
lives.  From up here you can smell the stench of the sewer waste and
filth from under the grate barring you to the sewers beneath.  You can
see the outline of a manhole in the ceiling through the shadows.{x
56182.name: {wT{*he {wS{*ecret {wS{*ewer {wE{*ntrance{x

description: {cThe passage continues along, becoming more narrow and shorter.  Water
still streams under your feet, but not as much as before.  The stench
of the sewers contnues to overwhelm your nose as you continue
trecking through the sewer passage. The noise of the streets becomes
slightly less. {x
56109.name: {wT{Dhe {wS{Dewer {wS{Douth {wP{Dassage{x

description: {cA small bend in the pipes shows much the same as was in the last
passage.  Refuge of all types.  Bits of bone, a trinket here, a lost bobble
there.  But at the heart, the stench remains, over whelming and noxious.
The passage splits 3 ways, north, south, and west.{x
56104.name: {wT{Dhe {wS{Dewer {wS{Douth {wP{Dassage{x

description: {c As you move north, the water level starts to become thinner and
thinner.  The horrid smell of the sewer is not as potent in this part.
It is still just as dark, you can barely make out a small rat on the
ground where you were about to step.  The only obvious exits are
north, south, and west.{x
56120.name: {wT{*he {wN{*ortheast {wS{*ewer {wP{*assage{x

description: {cThe sewer continues along, raw sewage covers the entire sewer floor.
sewer water streams through, heading towards no where in particular
small holes in the walls are now home to spiders, bugs, and rats, all
denizens of the sewers.  {x
56167.name: {wT{*he {wS{*ewer {wP{*assage{x

description: {cYou notice that the stream of sewer water floods at the drain at the base
of the wall.  Filth floats around the surface of the pool.  You see a small
snake slither across the pool after a small rat, apparently trying to catch
its next meal.  As you pass the sewer drain, you hear a loud growl.{x
56114.name: {wT{Dhe {wS{Dewer {wS{Douth {wP{Dassage{x

description: {cBurial niches cover the walls of the crypt, and sarcophaguses litter
the passage.  The musty smell fills your nose.  Bones litter the floor
between each sarcophagus, and mold grows everywhere.  You notice
that some of the sarcophaguses are open, revealing empty coffins.{x
56150.name: {wT{*he {wS{*ewer {wC{*rypt{x

description: {cThe sounds of the streets are vacant from here.  The noxious smell
of the sewers becomes far less from up here, but not gone.  The room
is covered in mold and grime from the street above.  Above you sits
a manhole, letting in a couple of rays of light, but not enough to
illuminate the room.  Footsteps can be heard from above.{x
56177.name: {wT{*he {wS{*ecret {wS{*ewer {wE{*ntrance{x

description: {cThis small room is covered with dust and mold.  The air is
stagnant and dry, making it difficult to breath.  Bits and pieces
of wood are littered all over the floor.  A musty smell emanates
from under a large wooden door on the floor, and a trapdoor hides
above you in the shadows.{x
56157.name: {wT{*he {wS{*ecret {wS{*ewer {wE{*ntrance{x

description: {cThe passage continues along, becoming more narrow and shorter.  Water
still streams under your feet, but not as much as before.  The stench of
sewage and waste continues to overwhelm your nose as you continue
trekking through the sewer passage. The noise of the streets becomes
slightly less. {x
56173.name: {wT{*he {wS{*ewer {wP{*assage{x

description: {cThis portion of the sewers looks as if 2 different builders work
collided together.  Moving north and south the walls are neatly
constructed and evenly placed.  To the east and west are crudely
dug entranceways.  Above you sits a perfect square grate.{x
56161.name: {wT{*he {wS{*ewer {wP{*assage{x

description: {cThe sewer continues on, the air feels thick and wet.  It clings to
your body as you try to pass through the sewer.  The walls are
covered with grime and all sorts of waste from above.  The sounds
of dripping and running water come from all around you, and your
nose is constantly filled with the retched smell of sewage.{x
56139.name: {wS{*ewer {wP{*assage{x

description: {cThe sewer continues in the direction you travel.  The air seems
to get colder and thicker, and it starts to cling to your body.  The
ceiling seems nonexistent in the darkness.  Water drips from
above you and lands in the stream under you.{x
56188.name: {wT{*he {wS{*ewer {wP{*assage{x

description: {cThe hallway is dank and oppressive here.  Pungent and stagnated
water collects here in puddles.  Dark and reeking water drips from the
ceiling and slides down the walls.  Slime collects in dark corners of
the room, and some of it seems to move on its own.  A pair of
guttering torches flicker on either side of the door, held in place by
iron sconces.  The door is sturdy, though it should be rotting off its
hinges in such a place.  Despite such sturdiness, the bottom of the
door has been chewed some by something...  Rats most likely.{x
56118.name: {wS{Decret {wP{Dassage{x

description: {cThe sewer continues along, raw sewege covers the entire sewer floor.
Sewer water streams through, heading towards no where in particular.
Small holes in the walls are now home to spiders, bugs, and rats, all
denizens of the sewers.  Above you is a grate.{x
56192.name: {wT{*he {wS{*ewer {wP{*assage{x

description: {cThe passage continues along, becoming more narrow and shorter.  Water
still streams under your feet, but not as much as before.  The stench of
sewage and waste continues to overwhelm your nose as you continue
trekking through the sewer passage. The noise of the streets becomes
slightly less. {x
56122.name: {wS{*ewer {wP{*assage

description: {cYou hear the streets of the city above you.  The city seems so alive
from the sewer, all the people walking, talking, and just living out their
lives.  From up here you can smell the stench of the sewer waste and
filth from under the grate barring you to the sewers beneath you. {x
56116.name: {wT{Dhe {wS{Dewer {wE{Dntrance{x

description: {cA small bend in the pipes shows much the same as was in the last
passage.  Refuge of all types.  Bits of bone, a trinket here, a lost bobble
there.  But at the heart, the stench remains, over whelming and noxious.{x
56170.name: {wT{*he {wS{*ewer {wP{*assage{x

description: {cThis small room is very neatly constructed.  The bricks on the
walls and floor are in perfect unison, evenly spaced and they
are perfectly cut into rectangles.  A large pipe jets down a foot
from the ceiling and snakes to the side of the wall and disappears
into the floor.  A trapdoor above you hides in the shadows, and
a square grate sits under you.{x
56145.name: {wT{*he {wS{*ecret {wS{*ewer {wE{*ntrance{x

description: {cAs you pass through, you see that the sewer becomes a four way
intersection.  To the south you see the ceiling start to slant down and
create a stairway going down, but it appears to be flooded with raw
sewage.  To the west the tunnel looks to be collapsed from large
stones from a building of sorts and much debris.  A skeleton lies half
crushed by a boulder.  You see an opening above you that you can
climb through.{x
56115.name: {wT{Dhe {wS{Dewer {wS{Douth {wP{Dassage{x

description:
{cBefore you sits a large mass of {rtenticles{c.  It's body breaks the surface
of the {wpool{c of {ws{*ewer{b water{c.  It's body is well of six feet long, and
each writhing tenticle is at least 10 feet long.{x
56114.room_name: {cA large hulking mass of tenticles sits here in a pool of {wS{*ewer {cwater.{x
56114.name: {rThe {wS{*ewer {cMonster{x~
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDGHIJK

description: used to check if feldorn is in the sewers for his mprog to be rescued
56100.name: sewerfeldorn~

description:
{wThis is the ghost of {cOskar {bStrakeln{w.  He was once a handsome dwarf,
very proud looking with a rather muscular build and taller than your average
dwarf.  He floats here in front of you, looking lost.{x
56174.room_name: A {bGhost{x of a dwarven mason floats here, looking lost.
56174.name: {cOskar {bStrakeln's {wGhost{x~

description:
{wBent over a bone, you see a humanoid creature trying to enjoy it's meal.  It
is covered in fur, with red eyes and whiskers. It has a long white tail lashing
about.  It stands just over 5 feet, with a hunch.{x
56183.name: {wThe {rWere{bRat{x~
subroutines:
F for A
F par ABCDEFGHIJK

56104.d_flags: D Collapses into a heap of rotting flesh.~
description:
{cBefore you stands what was once a {rHuman{c, but now is nothing more
than a pile of heaping flesh, slowly decomposing before you.  It walks
around searching for nothing in particular.{x
56104.room_name: {cA {rRotting {bZombie{x wanderers around, looking for nothing in particular.
56104.name: {cA {rRotting {bZombie{x~
subroutines:
F for AHV
F par DEGHIJK

description:
{*You see before a short figure, dressed in black.  He hides in the
shadows and behind the boxes and crates scattered all over the room.  He
look elven from his height and build.  You can also see he has pointed
ears, just like an elfs.  He is armed with a dagger.{x
56126.room_name: {*Hiding in the {8shadows{* is a short figure.{x
56126.name: {8The {*Thieves {rGuild {8Guard{x~

description:
Disgusting!  He is covered in slime and muck from the sewer.  His
hair is long and shaggy and his beard hangs in knotted strings. 
Wrapped around him are his tattered rags, dirty and filled with holes.
56127.room_name: A bum lounges here, covered in filth.
56127.name: a sewer bum~
